main event: A triangular object was observed in the sky over Hayward, California, trailing fog or clouds and changing course against high wind on 22 September 1953.
interesting points: The object was reported to be yellow with no visible exhaust and capable of slow flight and rapid acceleration., The object made a near vertical climb and disappeared at high speed., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., Mrs. (name redacted) observed the object as it approached from the direction of Oakland, California., There were no known aircraft or balloons in the area at the time of the sighting.
